short_summary: Procurement of a large format printer.
description: The Assistant Deputy Minister of Public Affairs (ADM(PA)) Exhibits & Displays Section has a requirement to procure a large format printer to replace two existing 60" and 104" large format printers that are past their life cycle.
full_summary:
====================
**IT Procurement**
===============

**Tender Announcement**
-------------------

**Title (English)**: 2BP3-157288 ITPro # 101104 - Large Format Printer for DND

**Title (Français)**: 2BP3-157288 ITPro # 101104 - Imprimante grand format pour MDN

**Reference Number**: SSC-24-00025766

**Tender ID**: BPM020951/25766

**Tender Closing Date**: March 8, 2024, 2:00:00 PM EST

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

* **Goods and Services**: The Department of National Defence's Assistant Deputy Minister of Public Affairs (ADM (PA)) Exhibits & Displays Section seeks to procure a large format printer to replace two (2) existing large format printers past their life cycle.
* **Scope of Contract**: The contract includes the supply, delivery, and installation of the equipment, as well as necessary training in both English and French to allow users to access all required features.
* **Region of Delivery**: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Contact Information**
-------------------

For further information, please contact:

* Name: Channary Luy
* Phone: 613-323-5347
* Fax: 613-123-4567
* Email: [None]
* Address: 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 2H8, Canada

**Attachments**
---------------

Tender documents are available for download at the following URLs:

* English: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/339DF1CE-EC41-4114-84B5-65208967A4C1
* Français: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/4667B41F-D03E-4E61-AE90-C593B630EB65

Note
